General.Name: Hebei Yangyuan ZhiHui Beverage Co Ltd
General.Description: Hebei Yangyuan ZhiHui Beverage Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, processing, production, and sale of walnut milk beverages in China. The company's products include walnut milk, walnut soybean milk, walnut peanut dew, walnut almond dew, and other plant protein beverages. It also sells its products online. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hengshui, China.
